p.d: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web. Based on an original idea by Olivier Szulzynger, Toma de Matteis, Éline Le Fur, Cristina Arellano, Stéphanie Tchou-Cotta (season 2, France, 2019) Cast: Mélanie Maudran (Claire Estrela), Maëlle Mietton (Alice Bastide), Jérémy Banster (Julien Bastide), Fred Bianconi (Virgile Berville), Valérie Kaprisky (Jo Real), Manuel Blanc (Guillem Cabestan), Bertrand Farge (Victor Estrela), Gary Guénaire (Théo Estrela), Chrystelle Labaude (Élizabeth Bastide), MoIse Santamaria (Manu Léoni)
